participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Sensitive and creative, she enjoys expressing herself through art and music.
participant_1.background: My boyfriend broke up with me and I lost my appetite. The death of Kurt Cobain marred my middle school years. I am a graphic designer. I listen to my favorite music from my childhood. I have a car that is acting up, but I'm still excited to start my day!

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, he values his family and aspires to use his creativity in filmmaking.
participant_2.background: I am not honest about my relationship with my girlfriend. I want to be a movie director when I grow up. I like to use my creativity to make unique and interesting items from thrift shop finds. My family is supportive of my endeavors to work puzzles and change the world. I am a good mother, but I need to learn to treat my girlfriend better.

content.text: I am having a bad day, my boyfriend broke up with me, I lost my appetite and I am really sad.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how you feel, my girlfriend broke up with me too and I have not been eating much either.
That is so comforting. I know we will get through this.
We will. I am not sure what we have to do, but I am sure we will figure it out.
I am a graphic designer, I like to listen to music from my childhood to feel better.
I am a stay at home mom, I like to create unique and interesting items from thrift shop finds.
That's really cool! I love thrift shopping.
Me too! I like to find things that are unique and I can use to make something special for my family.
What is your favorite song from your childhood?
I love `` Smells Like Teen Spirit '' by Nirvana.
That's a great song! I love Nirvana.
Me too! I am sad that Kurt Cobain died.
Me too! His death was really sad.
I think he was a great artist.
He was. I like his music a lot.
Me too! I think he is one of the best musicians of all time.
I agree! I love his music
